questions.text: What is the primary goal of Systems Engineering?

answers.text: To create successful systems that meet stakeholder needs
answers.explanation: Systems Engineering focuses on delivering solutions that satisfy stakeholder requirements effectively.
While software may be part of a system, SE encompasses much more than just software development.

questions.text: What is a system in the context of Systems Engineering?

answers.text: An integrated set of elements, subsystems, or assemblies that accomplish a defined objective
answers.explanation: This definition encompasses the key aspects of a system: integration, elements, and purpose.
This is too narrow - systems can include hardware, software, people, and processes.
